body:
This is really quite remarkable, it would be interesting if anyone knows Latin if this could be "explained away." Anyway, I saw a post on Gab about this, and verified it myself, taking 4 screenshots, if anyone wants to see the others I'll put them in the comments.

If you want to repeat this for yourself, go to google and type "translate quarantine" into the search, then change the desired language to Latin. Once you've done this, click the double arrows in the middle 3 times, translating back and forth, the attached picture is the final result.

I'm not exactly sure what to make of it, I would almost be inclined to think that the "Jews" purposefully manipulated the process to force this result; a "rub it in their faces" sort of thing if you will. In either case, whether it is a legitimate "coincidence," or purposefully manipulated to have this result, it seems to hint at something bigger behind the scenes of all of the chaos, if you didn't already believe this was the case.

guild.description:
This guild is to serve as a communication medium for fellow believers. The bible is the ultimate source of authority for any and all doctrine or doctrinal disputes. Posts can be made questioning the validity/veracity of the bible itself, but in any conversation wherein the topic itself is not the legitimacy of the bible, then it is assumed to be correct and factual. How else can any foundation be established except if the bible is a source of truth? Is man's opinion above God's word?

To the greatest extent possible i will avoid all forms of censorship, even spam would ideally be dealt with by down-voting rather than deleting. There is no restriction on post-type (you can post whatever you want) aside from the obvious nono's like porn, spam, calls to violence, etc..

body:
It is no surprise that google translate, especially when flip flopping, results in seemingly wild translations. What is strange is what the result is, as compared to the millions of other possibilities, like, as you said, I wanted to be a lonely forty.

As for the rest, that doesn't do much to explain how it managed to get from quarantine to what it did.  I understand this may not be explainable, but I'd like to think that if this wasn't manipulated by man that a person would be able to sensibly deduce how it ended up the way it did.

body: Yeah no, sorry but I'm not falling for this one. Translating quarantine into Latin on google translate just gives you *quadraginta*, which is actually *forty* and from there it just remains the same.
body_html: Yeah no, sorry but I'm not falling for this one. Translating quarantine into Latin on google translate just gives you quadraginta, which is actually forty and from there it just remains the same.

post.body:
This is really quite remarkable, it would be interesting if anyone knows Latin if this could be "explained away." Anyway, I saw a post on Gab about this, and verified it myself, taking 4 screenshots, if anyone wants to see the others I'll put them in the comments.

If you want to repeat this for yourself, go to google and type "translate quarantine" into the search, then change the desired language to Latin. Once you've done this, click the double arrows in the middle 3 times, translating back and forth, the attached picture is the final result.

I'm not exactly sure what to make of it, I would almost be inclined to think that the "Jews" purposefully manipulated the process to force this result; a "rub it in their faces" sort of thing if you will. In either case, whether it is a legitimate "coincidence," or purposefully manipulated to have this result, it seems to hint at something bigger behind the scenes of all of the chaos, if you didn't already believe this was the case.

So you think "da joos" run the world? Don't listen to those hitler creeps on this site. Half of them are just trolls and the other half are either clinically insane or just want a scapegoat.

The irony of this statement. Hate to break it to you but Jesus was pretty much indisputably not a fair-haired european. Can you guess what he was though? Hint: you'll be quite disappointed.

The irony of this statement. Hate to break it to you but Jesus was pretty much indisputably not a fair-haired european. Can you guess what he was though? Hint: you'll be quite disappointed.

guild.description:
This guild is to serve as a communication medium for fellow believers. The bible is the ultimate source of authority for any and all doctrine or doctrinal disputes. Posts can be made questioning the validity/veracity of the bible itself, but in any conversation wherein the topic itself is not the legitimacy of the bible, then it is assumed to be correct and factual. How else can any foundation be established except if the bible is a source of truth? Is man's opinion above God's word?

To the greatest extent possible i will avoid all forms of censorship, even spam would ideally be dealt with by down-voting rather than deleting. There is no restriction on post-type (you can post whatever you want) aside from the obvious nono's like porn, spam, calls to violence, etc..

Posts can be made questioning the validity/veracity of the bible itself, but in any conversation wherein the topic itself is not the legitimacy of the bible, then it is assumed to be correct and factual. How else can any foundation be established except if the bible is a source of truth? Is man's opinion above God's word?

To the greatest extent possible i will avoid all forms of censorship, even spam would ideally be dealt with by down-voting rather than deleting. There is no restriction on post-type (you can post whatever you want) aside from the obvious nono's like porn, spam, calls to violence, etc..
guild.name: JesusChrist

parent.body:
Because they can, and they take pleasure in it, knowing that they have the upper hand in the world, though not in the world to come. It is an open secret amongst any well educated person as far as i can tell, and not the college sort of well educated.

They literally brag openly about it, albeit in select venues and to select audiences; the question then is why wouldn't they also "leave clues" purposefully?

Because they can, and they take pleasure in it, knowing that they have the upper hand in the world, though not in the world to come. It is an open secret amongst any well educated person as far as i can tell, and not the college sort of well educated.

They literally brag openly about it, albeit in select venues and to select audiences; the question then is why wouldn't they also "leave clues" purposefully?

post.body:
This is really quite remarkable, it would be interesting if anyone knows Latin if this could be "explained away." Anyway, I saw a post on Gab about this, and verified it myself, taking 4 screenshots, if anyone wants to see the others I'll put them in the comments.

If you want to repeat this for yourself, go to google and type "translate quarantine" into the search, then change the desired language to Latin. Once you've done this, click the double arrows in the middle 3 times, translating back and forth, the attached picture is the final result.

I'm not exactly sure what to make of it, I would almost be inclined to think that the "Jews" purposefully manipulated the process to force this result; a "rub it in their faces" sort of thing if you will. In either case, whether it is a legitimate "coincidence," or purposefully manipulated to have this result, it seems to hint at something bigger behind the scenes of all of the chaos, if you didn't already believe this was the case.

post.title: Quarantine Translation to Latin (and back and forth and back)
